contentrichtext.text: The '''[[International Labour Organization]]''' is a specialized agency of the United Nations that deals with labour issues. '''ILO''' may also refer to: *[[Injection-locked oscillator]], a type of oscillator used in LC circuits *[[Integrated Lights-Out]] or iLO, an embedded server management technology *[[International Left Opposition]], an opposition group within the Comintern *[[International Linguistics Olympiad]], part of International Science Olympiads *[[Iloilo International Airport]]'s IATA code ==See also== *[[Ilo (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
